title: McDonald's shortens breakfast hours in Australia in response to nationwide egg shortage

title: The U.S. needs more of this critical metal — and China owns 80% of its supply chain

title: France's Macron made key mistakes and demonized the left, says bestselling economist Thomas Piketty
